name: harvest-project-rollover
description: A nodeJS script for updating Harvest Project on a scheduled basis.

scripts.client: NODE_ENV=dev node --inspect-brk services/client.js '{"account":"My Test Account","deployment_engineer":"James Keith","deployment_project":"iQ Deployment","account_manager":"Corbin Spicer","deployment_manager":"Simon Browning","client_hours":"2","client_bucket":"0","type":"Web"}'

author: Simon Browning
